channel.title: Software and Trading
channel.description: Recent content on Software and Trading

item.title: About
item.description: Quick introduction: I am a Senior Software Engineer focused mainly in Golang, C/C++ and Python. I’ve worked with other languages like Typescript, Java and Racket(Lisp). I have three main areas of knowledge and interest based on my background: Software development, Financial Markets and Military (Navy) I have two Master’s degrees: MD. in General Navy Corp. MD. in Stock Markets and Financial Derivatives.
